mapper.insert: INSERT INTO java505_team3_db.reservation_tp (customer_idx, customer_name, ceo_idx, ceo_store, reservation_stat, reservation_people, reservation_contents, reservation_date, reservation_time) VALUES (#{customerIdx}, #{customerName}, #{ceoIdx}, #{ceoStore}, 1, #{reservationPeople}, #{reservationContents}, #{reservationDate}, #{reservationTime})
mapper.select: SELECT R.ceo_store, reservation_date, reservation_time, reservation_stat FROM java505_team3_db.customer_tp U JOIN java505_team3_db.reservation_tp R ON U.customer_idx = R.customer_idx WHERE U.customer_idx = #{customerIdx} AND (R.reservation_stat = 1 OR R.reservation_stat = 2) ORDER BY reservation_date DESC, reservation_time DESC

SELECT ceo_idx, ceo_store, review_contents, review_score, review_date FROM java505_team3_db.customer_tp U JOIN java505_team3_db.review_tp V ON U.customer_idx = V.customer_idx WHERE U.customer_idx = #{customerIdx} ORDER BY review_date DESC

SELECT ceo_idx, ceo_store, question_title, question_date, question_complete FROM customer_tp U JOIN question_tp Q ON U.customer_idx = Q.customer_idx WHERE U.customer_idx = #{customerIdx} ORDER BY question_date DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE ceo_tp SET ceo_store = #{ceoStore}, ceo_main_menu = #{ceoMainMenu}, ceo_detail_menu1 = #{ceoDetailMenu1}, ceo_menu_img1 = #{ceoMenuImg1}, ceo_detail_menu2 = #{ceoDetailMenu2}, ceo_menu_img2 = #{ceoMenuImg2}, ceo_detail_menu3 = #{ceoDetailMenu3}, ceo_menu_img3 = #{ceoMenuImg3}, ceo_detail_menu4 = #{ceoDetailMenu4}, ceo_menu_img4 = #{ceoMenuImg4}, ceo_detail_menu5 = #{ceoDetailMenu5}, ceo_menu_img5 = #{ceoMenuImg5}, ceo_detail_menu6 = #{ceoDetailMenu6}, ceo_menu_img6 = #{ceoMenuImg6}, ceo_open_time = #{ceoOpenTime}, ceo_closing_time = #{ceoClosingTime}, ceo_city_address = #{ceoCityAddress}, ceo_full_address = #{ceoFullAddress}, ceo_call_number = #{ceoCallNumber}, ceo_contents = #{ceoContents}, ceo_category = #{ceoCategory}, ceo_thumbnail_img = #{ceoThumbnailImg}, ceo_main_img = #{ceoMainImg}, ceo_lat = #{ceoLat}, ceo_lon = #{ceoLon} WHERE ceo_idx = #{ceoIdx}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM customer_tp WHERE customer_follow LIKE concat('%',#{ceoStore},'%')
mapper.update: UPDATE customer_tp SET customer_follow = REPLACE(customer_follow, CONCAT(#{ceoStore}, ','), '') WHERE customer_idx = #{customerIdx}
